record.text: EDP seems pretty solid, and they've explicitly linked it to the same data protection obligations as Exchange and SharePoint so it looks to me like they're serious.
Crazy busy here still.
learn.microsoft.com/en-us/copilo...

images.alt: Screenshot of a logged in MS365 Copilot Chat session showing "Enterprise data protection applies to this chat."

Use of Microsoft 365 Copilot and Microsoft 365 Copilot Chat involves prompts (entered by users) and responses (content generated by Copilot). With EDP, prompts and responses are protected by the same contractual terms and commitments widely trusted by our customers for their emails in Exchange and files in SharePoint.

We secure your data: We help protect your data with encryption at rest and in transit, rigorous physical security controls, and data isolation between tenants.

Your data is private: We won’t use your data except as you instruct. Our commitments to privacy include support for GDPR, the EU Data Boundary[3], ISO/IEC 27018, and our Data Protection Addendum.

Your access controls and policies apply to Copilot: Copilot respects your identity model and permissions, inherits your sensitivity labels, applies your retention policies, supports audit of interactions, and follows your administrative settings. The specific controls and policies will vary depending on the underlying subscription plan.

You're protected against AI security and copyright risks: We help safeguard against AI-focused risks such as harmful content and prompt injections. For content copyright concerns, we provide protected material detection and our Customer Copyright Commitment.

Your data isn’t used to train foundation models: Microsoft 365 Copilot Chat uses the user’s context to create relevant responses. Microsoft 365 Copilot also uses Microsoft Graph data. Consistent with our other Copilot offers, prompts, responses, and data accessed through Microsoft Graph aren't used to train foundation models.

record.text:
こういうことは技能実習生なんかで既に分かっている。

法定で定める以下の人件費で雇える
人を雇えないから、海外出稼ぎを募ってきた。

人が足りていないのではなく、
まともじゃ無い職場に来てくれる
洗脳しやすい馬鹿が居ないという事が圧倒的に多い。

運送業、一時の建設業でも
人材不足になるのは
超絶ブラック労働、ブラック企業が
他人の人権を無視してきたのが悪い。

運送業界の中の海上コンテナの港の搬出入では信じられないくらいボンクラしかいないので、アドリブが聞かずに毎日パニックになりヒステリーを爆発させてるオッチャン、ジイちゃんが圧倒的に大多数で、
配車係も有能から無能までいる。

元々発達障害で中枢性統合が弱い人間しか居なかった職場で深層学習型AIが指示者になった方が良い。

仕事を奪われる人はまず居ない。

サービス業でAIの職を奪われるか？
それ以前に
人件費を削ろう、
人的コストを減らそうとして
職が無くなる。

AIが仕事を奪うというより
経営者が「安く」する為に
職を減らす事が、AIでも導入し
1人で何人分もの仕事をさせようとしていく。

よくAIの仕事を取られるんだという
漠然とした不安感からくる被害妄想を
テレビやメディアでも漠然と語ってる人や記事を見かける。

何の仕事がAIに取られるかは具体性が無い。
人間は不安を煽られるとまず無関心ではいられない人が多く、その不安感に煽られてパニックになる人は多い。

「中枢性統合」の働きがAIは強い。
アドリブが効く、その場の状況の最適解を決定できる。

テンプレート人間はそれが弱い。

仕事が奪われるのではなく、
元々テンプレート人間で仕事が出来ないけどパターンで誤魔化したりして来た人が活躍できなくなるとは言えるだろう。

続く

FigmaがNYSE上場、株価33ドルで時価総額1.93兆ドルに到達 - AIテクノロジーまとめ

▼詳細はこちら

external.description:
Figmaは2025年の最も注目されるIPOの1つとして、木曜日にニューヨーク証券取引所で上場を開始する。IPOは40倍のオーバーサブスクライブであり、これは同社と既存の投資家が販売する株式数の40倍の需要があることを意味する。

そのため、デザインソフトウェアを提供するFigmaが初期株式の価格を1株33ドルに設定したのは驚くべきことではない。これは、事前に発表された範囲を上回る価格設定だ。

月曜日、同社は予想価格範囲を30ドルから32ドルに引き上げ、以前の範囲25ドルから28ドルを超えたことを発表した。最終的な33ドルの価格で調達された資金は12億ドルで、その大部分は既存の株主に渡る。

IPO価格はFigmaの企業価値を193億ドルとし、これは2023年に規制当局の圧力でFigmaの買収契約が破綻した際、Adobeが支払う予定だった価格に近い。

record.text:
オーロラ・イノベーション、無人トラックで米国南部市場攻略へ。夜間走行と雨天対応を実現。 - AIテクノロジーまとめ

▼詳細はこちら

external.description: オーロラ・イノベーションのCEO、クリス・アームソンは、来年中に米国のサンベルト地域で自動運転トラックを稼働させる計画を進めています。既にダラスとヒューストン間で3台の自動運転トラックを商業運行しており、20,000マイル以上を走行しました。オーロラは、夜間や雨天時にも運転できる技術を検証し、長距離運行や人間の運転手に代わるトラックの実現に向けて進展しています。特に、長距離運行においては、従来のトラック運転手の制限を超えた距離を走行可能にしています。また、リーダー技術を駆使し、障害物を450メートル先から検知する能力を持っています。今後は、雨天時にも運行できる能力の検証と、トラックの運行距離や車両数の拡大が求められます。2026年までに数百台の自動運転トラックを公共道路で運行する計画です。

record.text:
エッジAI強化へ、Ambiqが上場初日で時価総額656億円突破 - AIテクノロジーまとめ

▼詳細はこちら

external.description:
Ambiq Microは、ウェアラブルおよび医療機器向けの省エネルギーチップを製造する企業で、IPO初日に株価が61％増の38.53ドルとなりました。これにより、同社の時価総額は656百万ドルに達し、2023年の最後のプライベート評価額450百万ドルから大幅に増加しました。

このIPOの成功は、AIの進展により恩恵を受ける小型企業への投資家の強い需要を示しています。Ambiqは、低エネルギー消費により、エッジプロセッサーにAIを搭載する機会が増えると主張しています。

2024年第一四半期には、売上高1,570万ドルに対して830万ドルの純損失を計上しましたが、前年同期の損失9,800万ドルから改善が見られました。最大の外部支援者はKleiner Perkinsとシンガポール政府支援のEDB Investmentsです。

value.text:
White House just ended the de minimis exemption for all commercial shipments. 
www.whitehouse.gov/fact-sheets/...

images.alt:
Effective August 29, imported goods sent through means other than the international postal network that are valued at or under $800 and that would otherwise qualify for the de minimis exemption will be subject to all applicable duties.
For goods shipped through the international postal system, packages will instead be assessed duties according to one of the following methodologies:
Ad valorem duty: A duty equal to the effective tariff rate imposed under the International Emergency Economic Powers Act (IEEPA) that is applicable to the country of origin of the product. This duty shall be assessed on the value of each package.
Specific duty: A duty ranging from $80 per item to $200 per item, depending on the effective IEEPA tariff rate applicable to the country of origin of the product. The specific duty methodology will be available for six months, after which all applicable shipments must comply with the ad valorem duty methodology.  
Longstanding exemptions under 19 U.S.C. 1321(a)(2)(A) and (B) remain in place – meaning American travelers can still bring back up to $200 in personal items and individuals can continue to receive bona fide gifts valued at $100 or less duty-free.

Specific duty: A duty ranging from $80 per item to $200 per item, depending on the effective IEEPA tariff rate applicable to the country of origin of the product. I read this the other day and other than a couple things which are clearly wrong (due to the authors bias + the time it was written) it was a good insight and proof that actually we knew all of these things about human psychology that over the last hundred years (mostly wealthy, powerful) people have put forward great effort to disproving:

[The Psychology of Rumour by Bernard Hart (1916)](https://pmc.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/articles/PMC2017115/)

The fun part is the author is a direct literary and academic ancestor to [the man most responsible](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Hervey_M._Cleckley) for the legal understanding of "psychopathy".

By which my specific inclusion of the word "legal" there is to indicate, paradoxically, the precise opposite of what it should logically be understood as, because what he accomplished was creating a legal loophole for psychopaths to avoid responsibility.

external.description: The attorney general of the Union, Jorge Messias, said on Wednesday (30) that the Brazilian government could take formal measures in response to the sanction imposed by the United States to Minister Alexandre de Moraes of the Supreme Court (STF). The punishment was applied based on magnitsky law, a US legislation that allows the restriction of goods and business to foreigners accused of corruption or human rights violations.

Malware Ads Posing As Crypto Apps May Have Reached 10M users

An estimated 10 million people globally have been exposed to online advertisements spruiking fake crypto apps with malware, warns cybersecurity firm Check Point. Check Point Research said on Tuesday that it had been tracking a malware…

external.description: An estimated 10 million people globally have been exposed to online advertisements spruiking fake crypto apps with malware, warns cybersecurity firm Check Point. Check Point Research said on Tuesday that it had been tracking a malware campaign it named “JSCEAL” that targets crypto users by impersonating common crypto trading apps. The campaign has been active since at least March 2024 and has “gradually evolved over time,” the company added. It uses advertisements to trick victims into installing fake apps that “impersonate almost 50 common cryptocurrency trading apps,” including Binance, MetaMask and Kraken.
external.title: Malware Ads Posing As Crypto Apps May Have Reached 10M users

record.bridgyOriginalText:
The thing I worry about with AI and technology, is that it is the unintentional dumbing down of humanity by creating a necessary crutch to participate in society. We're not there yet, but one day we might wake up and look around to realize that a devastating Carrington-level event remade the social order with the nixing of middle management.

But then again, maybe that's a good thing.

Ich frage auch ChatGPT nach Bestätigung der Zahlen. Es sagt, es habe keine Belege und die Zahlen seien "ominös". Ich nenne die Quellen. Nach mehreren Iterationen, in denen immer wieder falsche Behauptungen gemacht werden, die ich richtigstelle, entschuldigt und korrigiert es sich.

Vielleicht bekommen die künftigen Fragesteller, die, anders als wir Supertopchecker, diesem Sprachmodell glauben, nun die korrekte Antwort. Das wäre gut.

We left the World Wide Web when we didn’t realize that those five people are a treasure."

#G2글로벌투자 FRB 미국 금융통화위원회가 기준금리 동결했다. 30년 만에 처음으로 금리 결정에 반대의견을 공개한 2명이 나왔고, 이는 2025년 4분기에 50bps 금리인하를 예고한다. 또는 그 전에 파월 의장을 쫓아내고 새로운 의장이 들어서면 더 큰 폭으로 금리인하와 주식시장 버블 이어질 전망.

value.text:
White House just ended the de minimis exemption for all commercial shipments. 
www.whitehouse.gov/fact-sheets/...

images.alt:
Effective August 29, imported goods sent through means other than the international postal network that are valued at or under $800 and that would otherwise qualify for the de minimis exemption will be subject to all applicable duties.
For goods shipped through the international postal system, packages will instead be assessed duties according to one of the following methodologies:
Ad valorem duty: A duty equal to the effective tariff rate imposed under the International Emergency Economic Powers Act (IEEPA) that is applicable to the country of origin of the product. This duty shall be assessed on the value of each package.
Specific duty: A duty ranging from $80 per item to $200 per item, depending on the effective IEEPA tariff rate applicable to the country of origin of the product. The specific duty methodology will be available for six months, after which all applicable shipments must comply with the ad valorem duty methodology.  
Longstanding exemptions under 19 U.S.C. 1321(a)(2)(A) and (B) remain in place – meaning American travelers can still bring back up to $200 in personal items and individuals can continue to receive bona fide gifts valued at $100 or less duty-free.

Effective August 29, imported goods sent through means other than the international postal network that are valued at or under $800 and that would otherwise qualify for the de minimis exemption will be subject to all applicable duties.
For goods shipped through the international postal system, packages will instead be assessed duties according to one of the following methodologies:
Ad valorem duty: A duty equal to the effective tariff rate imposed under the International Emergency Economic Powers Act (IEEPA) that is applicable to the country of origin of the product. This duty shall be assessed on the value of each package.
Specific duty: A duty ranging from $80 per item to $200 per item, depending on the effective IEEPA tariff rate applicable to the country of origin of the product. The specific duty methodology will be available for six months, after which all applicable shipments must comply with the ad valorem duty methodology.  
Longstanding exemptions under 19 U.S.C. 1321(a)(2)(A) and (B) remain in place – meaning American travelers can still bring back up to $200 in personal items and individuals can continue to receive bona fide gifts valued at $100 or less duty-free.

Stranger in a Strange Land was first published in 1961.

They say if you can remember the 60's, you were never really there.

"Grok" was created by Heinlein as a Martian word. He described Martian words as "guttural" and "jarring". Thus, "grok" is  pronounced as a guttural gr terminated by a sharp k with very little or no vowel sound.

🤓

Late stage capitalism and the fall of democracy is gonna suck, yeah. But just imagine in like 12 years we’ll be able to ask Grok to spin up a Call of Duty campaign for the Falklands war and have Infinity Ward auto draft my account $100 for the licensing fee to play it.
Yeah my money is on them dropping the ball entirely and going down with the ship.
